data.name: Rule
desc: describes a rule that can be applies to a number of objects.
A rule consists of a sequence of RuleTerms describing the objects to which the rule should be applied, the RuleAction which should be used on the matching objects, and a parameter.

items.name: Action
lines: the action to perform on the matching objects.
The value can be one of the RuleAction constants.

items.name: Terms
lines: the rule terms describing the objects to which the rule should be applied.
